Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Provides for certain limited direct interstate shipments of wine for off-premises consumption
Summary: Provides for certain limited direct interstate shipments by retail licensees to sell wine for off-premises consumption.
LawCode: Amd ยง79-c, ren ยง79-d to be ยง79-e, add ยง79-d, ABC L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to providing for certain limited direct interstate shipments of wine for off-premises consumption
